Reviews.Title: “Uups, shared toilet - not what we excepted”
Reviews.Author: Juicyfin
Reviews.Content: hotel hotel low level hostel home breakfast tasty service excellent cramped dinner breakfast acceptable visiting toilet shared toilet corridor normal sized sit 2 door nice imagine hairy legs etc tiny portable shower dusty air mouses smell etc huh

Reviews.Title: “Probably my worst hotel experience ever.”
Reviews.Author: tony h
Reviews.Content: dirty sheets bed hair previous guest shower blocked water presure low fridge realizing switched door rotting food inside smell terrible window shut properly road noise outside kept awake arrived late evening else probably worst hotel experience

Reviews.Title: “Deceived”
Reviews.Author: AroundTheWorld000
Reviews.Content: advance booked ensuite beds read persons cheated surely happen nice people course exactly happened tried whithout toilet shower copy booking bed sheets broad bed slept mattress clean nights moved 2 beds filthy imagine cleaned allergy sit night coughing breakfast bad service totally deceived

Reviews.Title: “The worst Hotel ever!”
Reviews.Author: minettobia
Reviews.Content: booked ensuite arrived hotel discovered bathroom shared 7 people couldnt luggages chairs angers ac fan booked twin bed single bed little bit larger absolutely silent couldnt sleep stairs doors noisy environment quiet pub complained owner accomodation building 5th floor mansard larger shower windows lot hot bathroom floors downstairs noise week breakfast poor day wait 20 minutes breakfast hotels standard low doesnt worth price paid suggest friend

HotelInfo.Name: Rex Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: 49 Shepherds Bush Road, London W6 7LU, England
